titles.title: Layoff Tax Relief Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude certain severance payment amounts from income.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/1/2000--Introduced. Layoff Tax Relief Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income up to $2,000 of any "qualified severance payment." Defines such payment. Excludes from such definition payments exceeding $150,000.
